verse: Ah! Ariel, Ariel, the city where David encamped!
You will be punished by Yahweh of hosts

And the vision of all this has become for you like the words of a sealed document. When they give it to one who knows the document, saying, “Read this now!” He says, “I am not able, for it is sealed.”
And if the document is given to one who does not know how to read, saying, “Read this now!” he says, “I do not know how to read.”
therefore look, I am again doing something spectacular
Therefore Yahweh, who redeemed Abraham, says this to the house of Jacob:
